english.segment1: Falling on my knees in worship. Giving all I am to seek your face. Lord all I am is yours
english.segment2: My whole life. I place in your hands. God of Mercy. Humbled I bow down. In your presence at your throne
english.segment3: I called you answered. And you came to my rescue and I. I wanna be where you are
english.segment4: In my life be lifted high. In our world be lifted high. In our love be lifted high
